actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to promote rail-highway safety by requiring light-reflecting markings on railroad locomotives and cars.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation, under the Interstate Commerce Act, to establish such orders as may be necessary to require carriers to place on all locomotives and cars in service such light-reflecting paint or other reflector markings as the Secretary determines to be best suited to promote safety at rail-highway crossings. (Adds 49 U.S.C. 26(i))

titles.title: A bill to promote rail-highway safety by requiring light-reflecting markings on railroad locomotives and cars.
